hive_lesson.title: 1042 Nabeel's Place
hive_lesson.description: Nabeel talks about his apartment and neighbors.

hive_text_custom.text: : So, what about you? You're still in the same place right?
: Oh, it's great. I'm actually quite satisfied with it now.
: Oh, good because I though you wanted to move at one point.

: Yeah, I thought about it for awhile but then I decided to stay there. There's a lot of good points there. It's a quite neighborhood. It's not too far from the train, so I can get to work easily. For awhile I thought it might be a little too expensive, just slightly above my budget, but I've gotten used to it, and my cats love it. They're really comfortable there, so I think I'm going to stay.
: Oh, great. I love your cats. Do they have a lot of
: They have enough room. Of course, they're
in the house. I was living there last year but they've adapted pretty well, so there's a roof there. I can take them up and roam around. There's plenty of places for them to hide.
: Now, what about your neighbors. Are you still living near Matt and Laura.

: Actually, it's really funny. They'd been there for about four months, and last weekend they invited some people over, about five or six of their colleagues. They had a little party. They played poker, had lots of booze around, but unfortunately, the neighbors complained to the landlord, and the landlords were just really angry.
and said they wanted them out by the end of the week, so yeah, Matt and Laura have been
: Wow, and just five people over.
: Yeah, it was like five or six people and apparently it was loud enough. I think it is because the neighborhood is kind of family-oriented, so people are used to people having parties.
: Yeah, there's a lot of echo in the building actually for some reason.
: Well, that's too bad for them. Where did they move?
: They just moved down the street to another apartment building. It's smaller so I don't think they're happy about it. Oh, well.
: Well, tell them I said 'Hey' when you see them.

answers: c) It is far from the train.
hive_lesson_quiz.question: 1) What does he say about his apartment?
3) At his neighbor's party there was ______ .

answers: d) They had to move out.
hive_lesson_quiz.question: 4)Because of the party, what happened?

hive_text_custom.text: to take the bus instead of the train. It's faster.
